roleset.name: take apart, separate
roleset.note: DECOUPLE-V NOTES: Corrected by Claire. (from decouple.01-v)

role.descr: First or all (where one constituent) things being separated
Thing being separated from (when separate constituent)

example.name: All arguments
example.text: Nixon did away with that a much better way when he decoupled the dollar from gold.

example.name: Ergative
example.text: However, the photons still retain the distribution they had when they decoupled from matter, and at that time they reflected the distribution of the matter

example.name: decouplers in one constituent
example.text: In Gayle Rubin's 1984 essay, "Thinking Sex," she decoupled the lesbian/feminist alliance.
